channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: ðŸ”´ 10:43 Air alert in Donetsk region. Follow further messages.
item.description: ðŸ”´ 10:43 Air alert in Donetsk region. Follow further messages. #Donetsk_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
